Class MyFile

java.lang.Object
java.io.File
it.disi.unitn.lasagna.MyFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<File>
public class MyFile extends File
This class extends java.io.File to provide further functionality.

      public void checkReadWritePermissions() throws PermissionsException

      Throws:
      PermissionsException - If the user does not have reading or writing permissions on the given folder

    • removeContentExceptFile

      public void removeContentExceptFile(@NotNull @NotNull String fileName) throws IOException, InvalidArgumentException
      This method removes all files except the ones whose name contains the given value.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The given file name. This value cannot be null or an empty string.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file cannot be deleted for whatever reason.
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given argument is null or an empty string

    • removeContent

      public void removeContent(@Nullable @Nullable String fileExt) throws IOException
      This method removes the content of a folder. It can also be used to delete files with specific extensions.
      Parameters:
      fileExt - The given file extension. This value can be null or an empty string.
      Throws:
      IOException - If any file cannot be deleted for whatever reason.
